trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Jubkhal has a pair of metal containers in his hands, and they appear to be piping hot.
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the metal containers to the lookouts.
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_000<tab>You're the traveler who rescued the child of Mehvan and Qerasaf, yes? Do you have a moment to spare for the brave souls that watch over our village?
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_001<tab>With the Radiant Host shorthanded, the courageous among us have volunteered to climb those treacherous cliffs and keep lookout for any approaching beasts.

TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_002<tab>I would make their long days easier with a home-cooked meal, but I cannot reach the summit on my own. Every mount that might carry me there is otherwise indisposed, but I don't believe that will prove a problem to one so resourceful as you.
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_003<tab>If you would be so kind, please deliver these meals to the lookouts at the summit. I'll pay you for your troubles, if that will help speed things along.
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_004<tab>Sheer mountain cliffs are no obstacle to one such as you, I'm sure. Please deliver these meals to the lookouts above─doubtless they're hungry by now.
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_LOOKOUTA04261_000_010<tab>That smell's set my stomach rumblin' something fierce. Pray tell me you've brought enough to share.

TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_LOOKOUTA04261_000_011<tab>It's <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> for me!? Why, thank you! I was beginning to dread the rest of my watch. There's nothin' like a spiced curry to keep hunger away.
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_LOOKOUTA04261_000_012<tab>Hmm, I've never seen a container quite like this before. Not a drop of curry was spilled in your flight, and it's still pipin' hot! Thank you, friend!
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_LOOKOUTA04261_000_013<tab>There's nothin' like a curry to get you through an uneventful watch. Thanks for bringin' it all this way, friend!
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_LOOKOUTB04261_000_020<tab>The sounds of my stomach would drown out the alarum... Say, you didn't bring anything to eat, did you?

TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_LOOKOUTB04261_000_021<tab>Ah, I knew I recognized that heavenly scent! Spices to fortify the spirits and tea to sharpen the senses. This will tide me over until my replacement arrives.
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_LOOKOUTB04261_000_022<tab>Thanks to you, the rest of my watch should go by in a flash. I'll toast to your generosity when I'm done!
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_030<tab>I can see you've delivered the meals. If you had eaten them, I would be able to smell your guilt. I am grateful, as I'm sure the lookouts are as well.

TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_031<tab>Long ago we would post soldiers upon those cliffs, that we might see invaders approaching by sea. To think something much worse would eventually cross the ocean...
TEXT_AKTKZF006_04261_JUBKHAL_000_032<tab>Regardless, we are blessed that nature has provided us a way to watch for danger. I hope to keep our lookouts fed for as long as I can.
